head1.en: Glottologist is a JavaScript translation framework
head1.fr: Glottologist est un framework JavaScript de traduction

what-content.en: Glottologist is JavaScript framework that works in the browser (or on NodeJS). It will help you to provide a different version of your website, depending on the user language.
what-content.fr: Glottologist est un framework JavaScript qui fonctionne dans le navigateur (ou dans NodeJS). Il vous aidera a proposer une version differente de votre site, en fonction du language de vos utilisateurs.

productive-content.en: With his well engineered functions, Glottologist will not destroy your already existing app/website. The philosophy behind Glottologist (and my other projects), is that you should only add, not remove or refactorize the code. So, you'll be able to integrate Glottologist with each of your projects ğŸ˜Š.

install-content.en: Glottologist is simple to install and setup. Here is how you install the browser and node version.
install-content.fr: Glottologist est simple a installer et setup. Voici comment installer la version navigateur, suivis de NodeJS.
